name: Tetrotate
description:
Pick up and kick around a cube which controls the orientation of the world.
The world is made up of four surfaces: grass, ice, honey and rubber.
GMTK jam 2022 entry "Roll of the Dice"

Controls
Keyboard: WASD/Arrows to move, SPACE to jump, CTRL to kick

Credits
Cube Man by bevouliin.com Game menu vector created by upklyak
Grass vector created by freepik
Brown pattern vector created by brgfx
Car rim vector created by vectorpocket
Honey drop vector created by macrovector
Door vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com

Known Issues
Floaty jumps after rotating
Cube/character can get stuck in wall
